channel.title: Tea Factory Museum on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Tea Factory Museum on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Munnar in Monsoon
item.description: It was the first long weekend of Independence day of 2011 after Pamela had joined her job. We were very keen to get away from Bangalore as last time it was March when we went to Chickbelapur. Initial plan was to visit Hampi; but after talking to few homestay around we decided against it as that part of Karnataka was expecting to get unusual amount of rain and flood could be any time.
